articles.title: Sir Mick Jagger explains how he went unnoticed at North Carolina bar - Daily Mail
articles.description: Sir Mick Jagger, 78, has explained how he went unnoticed when he visited the Thirsty Beaver Saloon in Charlotte, North Carolina in September.
articles.content:
He's one of the most famous rock stars in the world.
But Sir Mick Jagger, 78, went unnoticed when he visited the Thirsty Beaver Saloon in Charlotte, North Carolina for a drink while on tour in Septe… [+3148 chars]

articles.author: Kendall Trammell, CNN
articles.title: The full lyrics to 'Auld Lang Syne' so you don't mumble your way through it - CNN
articles.description: As the clock strikes midnight on New Year's Eve, voices all over the world will resurrect the centuries-old tradition of singing "Auld Lang Syne" to say goodbye to the passing year.

articles.author: Lisa Respers France, CNN
articles.title: Nicolas Cage doesn't want to be called an 'actor' - CNN
articles.description: Nicolas Cage knows it may sound "pretentious," but he would prefer you refer to him as a "thespian."

articles.author: Lisa Respers France, CNN
articles.title: Nicole Kidman is not here for this Tom Cruise question - CNN
articles.description: Nicole Kidman may portray Lucille Ball in "Being the Ricardos," but don't try and draw comparisons between their former marriages.
